leon.skillDescription: Summons Holy Sword that deals physical damage equal to (80/180/340)% of hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Leon
form.background: Leon has just started his adventure and he has no idea what he's doing. He spends more time cleaning up his messes than saving damsels.

form.name: Skilled Leon
form.background: Leon has learned from his mistakes (and his scrapes and bruises) and has become a competent if not spectacular hero.

form.name: Famous Leon
form.background: Leon's famous now and he lets it get to his head. He draws his pen faster to sign autographs than he draws his sword for combat.

form.name: Leon of Destiny
form.background: Leon's big shot attitude almost cost him his life and the lives of those he had sworn to protect. He realizes now that he set out to become a hero to save people, not to be rewarded with fame and fortune.

skill.passive: Summons the ultimate Holy Sword every 4 blocks. Deals physical damage equal to 380% of attack power and ignores target's armor equal to 50% of own armor.

form.name: Leon of Fate
form.background: Leon has been charged by the goddesses to save the world. Finally, he can put all that adventuring to good use!

skill.passive: Summons the ultimate Holy Sword every 4 blocks. Deals physical damage equal to 380% of attack power and ignores target's armor equal to 50% of own armor.

form.name: Leon of Light
form.background: Every time Leon fights against evil, dazzling lights cover his entire body, radiating an unbreachable energy. The monsters tremble at his sight, let them fall to Leon of Light

skill.passive: Summons Ultimate Holy Sword whenever the hero uses a chain-3 skill, that deals physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and also deals extra physical damage equal to 10% of the hero's HP. The bonus damage ignores enemy's armor equal to 100% of the hero's armor.

rochefort.skillDescription: When a skill block is used it deals physical damage equal to (100/150/250)% according to the chain length, and provides a (25/50/75)% chance of blocking up to 10 attacks for the next 5 secs.

form.name: Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort was a simple fencing instructor until he was drafted into the Tristan army.

form.name: Libertine Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort became so sick of his life that he illegally escaped from the army seeking freedom and beautiful women.

form.name: Romantic Rochefort
form.background: As Rochefort entered the war with the Neth Empire, he encountered D'artagnan and fell in love. He lost an eye while trying to protect her in a fierce battle.

form.name: One-Eyed Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort announced his desire to join the Musketeers. His request is denied, but he continued to train.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 100% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. (Activates once every second)

form.name: Musketeer Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort's exploits could no longer be ignored, and he was allowed admission into the Musketeers.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 100% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. (Activates once every second)

form.name: Victor Rochefort
form.background: His name became a symbol of victory in Trista, and his legend grew among the people. However, his heart belonged to a single person.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 200% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. When the counterattack is a critical hit, the Hero immediately generates a block of its own. (Activates once every second)

kriemhild.skillDescription: Explodes with the energy of the earth, dealing physical damage equal to (50/142/322)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Kriemhild
form.background: A female knight of a tribe known for fighting demons. The most skillful knights of this tribe are Kriemhild and Siegried. People think there's a lot of chemistry going on between those two.

form.name: Cursed Kriemhild
form.background: A demon slaying knight who was cursed by a powerful demon to sleep forever.

form.name: Kriemhild of Misfortune
form.background: To save Kriemhild from the cruse, her lover, Siegfried, uses a forbidden tribal spell to undertake Kriemhild's curse for himself. When Kriemhild awakens and learns what happened, she is overwhelmed with grief and is unable to leave her lover's side.

form.name: Kriemhild of Massacre
form.background: Not long after Kriemhild lost her lover, demons come looking for Siegfried's soul. Kriemhild's sorrow turns to rage, slaughtering all the demons that approach Siegfried.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 2 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 2 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

form.name: Kriemhild of Protection
form.background: The only way for Siegfried can wake is for him to find an exit in his dream world. It is an endless wait for Kriemhild, but she has faith in him. She makes a resolution not to leave his side until he wakes up.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 2 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 2 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

form.name: Kriemhild of Oath
form.background: A Goddess appears before her as she is protecting Siegfried. The Goddess offers her help to awaken him, and in return asks Kriemhild to help them save the world from danger when the time comes. For her lover, she makes an oath to do so.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 5 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 4 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

roland.skillDescription: When a skill block is used, the Hero deals physical damage equal to (50/100/175)% of the hero's resistance according to the chain length and the Hero's defense increases by 25% of hero's resistance for 5 secs.

form.name: Roland
form.background: An orphan who became an apprentice monk in service to the Goddesses.

form.name: Strong Roland
form.background: Roland was very strong, showing brilliant talents in physical activities rather than practicing asceticism. At first he was a troublemaker but he gained the trust of the people after he successfully took on the village thugs.

form.name: Monk Roland
form.background: Roland begins to agonize about his future. During his slump, he met Maria. After that, Roland starts his training to become a true monk so that he can be with Maria.

sigruna.skillDescription: Shoots feathers that attack the enemies in back, dealing magic damage equal to (10/25/52)% of the hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Sigruna
form.background: Sigruna is a member of the Silver Elf clan. She lives a very tough life because she is from the lowest caste in the elves' caste-based society.

form.name: Sigruna of Endeavor
form.background: One day, her parents were attacked by monsters. In order to support her family, she tries to climb the social ladder at all costs. There is only one way to do this: join the King's Elite Guard. To make it, Sigruna trains whenever possible.

form.name: Sigruna of Spirit
form.background: After failing her 7th examination, she gives up on her hopes and dreams. Her parents, who have recovered from the attack, encouraged her to go on. Now Sigruna feels unstoppable.

demona.skillDescription: Shoots thorns of hell to an enemy in the rear and deals magic damage equal to (50/120/250)% of the Hero's attack power. A flame stack will pile up equal to (1/2/3).

form.name: Demona
form.background: Centuries ago, the Apostles brought demons from another dimension to destroy Hasla, and those demons wrecked havoc using humans as hosts. Demona was one of these human hosts.

form.name: Demona the Fiend
form.background: Demona battled against the evil inside of her, until one day, a saintess exorcised the demon from her, leaving only the power behind. This was the birth of the first devil.

form.name: Demona of the Pit
form.background: Humans associated the demons with evil. Demona fought a lonely fight against humanity. However, more and more demons were born, and Demona gathered them together.

d'artagnan.skillDescription: Fires consecutive bullets, dealing physical damage equal to (81/297/540)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: D'Artagnan
form.background: A new gunman in the desert area. Despite not used to using a gun she still dreams of becoming a sheriff one day.

form.name: Hunter D'Artagnan
form.background: A women who has fully mastered the gun through endless training. She's well known for arresting countless outlaws.

form.name: Musketeer D'Artagnan
form.background: Highly skilled at capturing outlaws and a master of weaponry. D'Artagnan fights in the war between the Neth Empire and the Western Country. Her prowess on the battlefield earns her the attention of the Musketeers. She joins the Musketeers and although they are few in number, they are a powerful force in the Western Country.

teresa.skillDescription: Shoots a magic beam dealing magical damage equal to (75/150/275)% of the Hero's attack power according to the chain length and leaves the Mark of Light on the eenmy of 5 secs.

form.name: Teresa
form.background: Born in a slum in Trista. She made her living by stealing and begging, but she was quick-witted and dexterous. People say that her father used to be a legendary hunter.

form.name: Poor Teresa
form.background: Teresa got caught stealing from a Western outlaw. She tried to escape by grabbing the outlaw's weapon but accidently shot him.

form.name: Runaway Teresa
form.background: With blood on her hands, Teresa ran away. Teresa struggled to survive with all her might.

dorothy.skillDescription: Fires Magic Beam, dealing magic damage equal to (70/150/240)% of the hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Dorothy
form.background: Born with a high affinity to magic, her latent talent is great.

form.name: Genius Dorothy
form.background: In addition to her affinity for magic, Dorothy also grasps magical concepts very easily. She is a true genius.

form.name: Genius Witch Dorothy
form.background: Dorothy has become skilled in all 4 elements of magic. However, her craving for power is not sated.

cano.skillDescription: Deals magic damage equal to (85/125/250)% according to the chain length and charms the enemy for 5 seconds.

form.name: Cano
form.background: She was not only smart and polite but she sung very well so everyone liked her. The only problem was that she looked very ordinary...

form.name: Top Student Cano
form.background: Cano studied hard to enter the School of Magic. She concentrated on her study to the point of isolation. Still, the people of the village sent her letters to keep her company.

form.name: Beautiful Cano
form.background: Cano received the highest score on the school's entrance examination. She attended the school talent show and won by singing. However, she accidently tripped on her way off the stage and her glasses broke... Surprise! She was the most beautiful girl in school!

maria.skillDescription: Summons an object that heals nearby allies 8 times for (1/3/6)% of the Hero's attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Maria
form.background: An ordinary girl that lives in a small church in town. Due to her kind and devoted attitude, she receives the respect of the people in town despite being very young.

form.name: Sister Maria
form.background: Living in a church, the girl eventually becomes a sister and her popularity and virtue spread beyond the town.

form.name: Mother Superior Maria
form.background: As her internal strength continues to show divine power, the religious order of the Empire begins to pay great attention to her. Although she is young she is qualified to become Mother Superior.

joan.skillDescription: Throws a wave of energy that deals magic damage equal to (49/122/221)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Joan of Arc
form.background: A girl who wants to become a knight to avenge her parent's death. However, she knows it is difficult for a girl become a knight, but she hopes she can become strong enough to overcome their prejudice.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 15 whenever a block is used.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Knight Joan of Arc
form.background: Joan of Arc becomes a knight after rigorous training, but she must hide the fact that she is a girl. Luckily, the armor for men isn't as revealing as the armor for women.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 15 whenever a block is used.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Steel Knight Joan of Arc
form.background: Even after she revealed that she was indeed female, her stoic demeanor and calm in battle earned her the title of Steel Knight.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 30 and takes allies' damage for 5 seconds whenever a block is used.

bravedog.skillDescription: Summons a demon sword that deals magic damage equal to (56/178/322)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Brave Dog
form.background: There are two things you can count on in this world: Brave Dog being brave and Goblins smelling like old milk.
howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

warrior.skillDescription: A piercing attack that deals physical damage equal to (49/150/271)% of attack power.

form.name: Warrior
form.background: As a warrior of the East, he trains to reach a higher state of being by battling against the strongest opponents he can find.
howToGet: Stage: Appears at Deep Sea 3-13 Hard.
Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

farmboy.skillDescription: Throws a wave of energy that deals magic damage equal to (49/122/221)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Farm Boy
form.background: He worked hard on the farm, but now he's set out on a quest to save his cabbages from monsters.
